PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-04872007-04-02,  ,  RC,  , 
ActCanada Revenue Agency Act
PrecisAppointment of ROBERT J. (BOB) HEALEY of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, selected from a list of nominees submitted by the Province of Newfoundland and Labrador, to be a director of the Board of Management of the Canada Revenue Agency, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of L. Bernice Buckle.
